InstructionData.Title: Event loop test
InstructionData.Author: Kdandikk
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias time r15 move r14 1 move r13 2 s db Setting 11111111
lbn time HASH("StopWatch") HASH("UTC") Time Minimum add r1 time 4 add r0 time 0 MainLoop: lbn time HASH("StopWatch") HASH("UTC") Time Minimum #update with current time every loop
#mod r1 time 60 #s db Setting r1 brlt time r1 2 jal doAFlip brlt time r2 2 jal doAFlip2
#mod r1 time 60 #round r1 r1 #s db Setting r0 j MainLoop
doAFlip: add r14 r14 2 #process method s db Setting r14
ld r0 $1D07E Setting # compute next time add r1 time r0 j ra
doAFlip2: add r13 r13 2 #process method s db Setting r13 add r2 time 10 # compute next time j ra
